Title: Julie Walking Home
Writer: Agnieszka Holland, Roman Gren, Arlene Sarner
Actors: Miranda Otto, William Fichtner, Lothaire Bluteau, Ryan Smith
Plot: Her son dying of cancer and her marriage falling apart, Julie flees to Poland in search of a man who can heal using his hands. Julie finds not only a magical cure for her son, but also comes across a love so pure it begins to heal the aching in her heart.
